title: Attenuation of decabromodiphenyl ether (BDE209) using Ag/Fe0 complexed with citrate in various environmental and toxicity assessments by evaluating ryegrass
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00858D, Paper
Jianyu Gong, Ruiyuan Xue, Yake Xu, Hao Lv, Nan Wang, Xiaoming Su
Utilizing the Ag/Fe0 and citrate complex for the efficient and safe removal of BDE209.
